titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Fr. W. Krüger diaries
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-07-30T11:15-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: 2013, added container list and content from researcher Nicolas Patin about other diaries

did.abstract: Relates to activities of Infanterie Regiment von Lützow (in Rhineland) No. 25, 1917-1918, and to activities of the Schutzstaffel, 1938-1939. Includes photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Fr. W. Krüger diaries, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1973.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Relates to activities of Infanterie Regiment von Lützow (in Rhineland) No. 25, 1917-1918, and to activities of the Schutzstaffel, 1938-1939. Includes photographs.

altformavail.head: Related Collection(s)
altformavail.p: Other diaries of Friedrich-Wilhelm Krüger (1894-1945) can be found in the following archives: Volume 1 : 1914-1915, Bundesarchiv Freiburg Germany (MSG/2/13585) Volume 2 : 1915-1916, Bundesarchiv Freiburg Germany (MSG/2/13584) Volume 3 : No information Volume 4 : 1917-1918, Hoover Institution Volume 5 : 1918, Bundesarchiv Koblenz Germany (NL 410/6 among 31 personal boxes) Volume 6 : 1918-1932, Bundesarchiv Freiburg Germany (MSG/2/13583) 1938-1939 diary : Hoover Institution (photocopies available in I.f.Z. in Munich) 1944 diary : United States Holocaust Museum Memorial, Washington D.C.

controlaccess.corpname: Germany. Heer. Infanterie Regiment von Lützow (i. Rhein.), 25.

World War, 1914-1918--Germany.

did.unittitle: Photocopies of diaries for research use
